description.raw:
Currently drogon has an installation of nvidia-docker2. This PR support the differences between nvidia-docker1 and nvidia-docker2 until all the nodes are migrated to nvidia-docker2.

The node has to delcare the NVIDIA\_DOCKER2\_NODE as true in the node environment variables:

Tested:

* nvidia-docker2 in drogon:

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64_test_drogon&build=4)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_gazebo-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64\_test\_drogon/4/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64_test_drogon/4/))


* nvidia-docker1 in optimus:

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=1944)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_gazebo-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/1944/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/1944/))

The node has to delcare the NVIDIA_DOCKER2_NODE as true in the node environment variables:

title: Support for nodes with nvidia-docker2

summary.raw:
Currently drogon has an installation of nvidia-docker2. This PR support the differences between nvidia-docker1 and nvidia-docker2 until all the nodes are migrated to nvidia-docker2.

The node has to delcare the NVIDIA\_DOCKER2\_NODE as true in the node environment variables:

Tested:
